title: UAAPS Hooks Configuration
description: Schema for hooks/hooks.json — defines shell commands and LLM prompts triggered at agent lifecycle events.

version.description: Hooks config format version. Currently always 1.

hooks.description: Map of lifecycle event name → array of hook groups.

permission-request.description: When a permission dialog is shown. Supports blocking.

pre-prompt.description: Before a user prompt is processed. Supports blocking.

session-start.description: When a new session begins. Can inject context.

session-end.description: When a session terminates. Cleanup only.

stop.description: When the agent finishes responding. Supports blocking.

sub-agent-end.description: When a sub-agent finishes. Supports blocking.

matcher.description: Regex pattern to filter by tool name. Omit to match all tools.

command.description: Shell command to execute (required when type='command'). Receives event JSON on stdin. Exit code 2 blocks.

prompt.description: LLM prompt to evaluate (required when type='prompt'). Use $ARGUMENTS to reference event input.

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in seconds. Defaults to 30.
